name: REGISTER_VERIFY
value:

The link will expire after 10 minutes.

value: Email is invalid or already exists.

value: Already registered! Please try a different one.

value: Sorry, there was an error uploading your file.

value: Sorry, your token is not exists or already expired.

value: Check Out date must be greater than Check In date.

value: Please choose a room before proceeding.
